caption:
What remarkable thing are you going to do? Will you make someone smile, raise money for a charity, perform on stage? Or maybe you might climb a mountain, win a medal in a race, stand up to bullies or write a song? Whatever you do, make it amazing! You could do something solo, with your friends, with your family, or with your school! 
Just post a picture of your remarkable achievement(s) on Shuttersong, tag me - @sapphireofficial - and use the hashtag - #DoSomethingRemarkable ? There is no age limit and anyone can do it ? Closing date is the 5th of September at 23:59pm BST ? I will make a montage of all of your remarkable achievements and post it out all over my social media ? Do absolutely anything!! ? You can do it ? I believe in you!! ? You are remarkable ? You inspire me to sing ? Largest hugs and kisses to you all ? Have a fantastic day ? Sapphire Xx

Quote from 'Paper Towns'. Film out 24th July 2015 in the USA and 28th August 2015 in the UK. (I'm really excited to see it!!) #sapphire #singer #music
